com.reactivecascade.reactive

Class ReactiveLong

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reactivecascade.reactive.Subscription<T,T>
      • com.reactivecascade.reactive.ReactiveValue<java.lang.Long>
        • com.reactivecascade.reactive.ReactiveLong
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGettable<java.lang.Long>, INamed, IAtomicValue<java.lang.Long>, IReactiveSource<java.lang.Long>, IReactiveTarget<java.lang.Long>

    public class ReactiveLong
extends ReactiveValue<java.lang.Long>
    A Long which can be updated in an atomic, thread-safe manner.

    This is similar to an AtomicLong with reactive bindings to get and set the value in reactive chains (function sequences that can fire multiple times).

    * Created by phou on 30-05-2015.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.reactivecascade.reactive.Subscription
